 2012-08402012-06-19EC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Designating Regulatory Provisions for Purposes of Enforcement (Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999)
PrecisREGULATIONS DESIGNATING REGULATORY PROVISIONS FOR PURPOSES OF ENFORCEMENT (CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999) in order to secure the imposition of the new fine scheme following the successful prosecution of an offence involving harm or risk of harm to the environment, or obstruction of authority.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0134 Publication Date: 2012-07-04
